Sentencas: Various commercial nickel oxides were examined with respect to their relevant powder properties for application as anodes or anode substrates in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC).
Titulo: Evaluation of commercial nickel oxide powders for components in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The powders were characterized regarding their morphology, grain size distribution, BET surface and sintering behavior.
Titulo: Evaluation of commercial nickel oxide powders for components in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Furthermore, anode substrates were produced from these powders together with yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) powder.
Titulo: Evaluation of commercial nickel oxide powders for components in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The sintering behavior, gas permeability and electrical conductivity of these components were determined and compared with the current standard material used for SOFC development at Research Centre Julich.
Titulo: Evaluation of commercial nickel oxide powders for components in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A comparison of the powder and component properties indicate a significant influence of the powder properties on the components produced.
Titulo: Evaluation of commercial nickel oxide powders for components in solid oxide fuel cells
